page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content: The people that we interviewed feel that in the last five years{Mawgan has not changed much except that a few new house's have been built.It is believed that the village is not as pretty as it used to be but regular holiday makers don't seem to notice the difference.The{shop}is open from 9am to 6pm but the shopkeeper works from 7am to 7pm with an hour for lunch if she's lucky.The villager's get up surpriseingly early considering there is not any traffic or machinary to disturb them.There are a few group activitie's such as a{friendship {group,woman's institute}and a{coffee {morning}for children and parent's surprisingly the children of the village like to visit the older people.
